General.Name: Pacific Pipe Public Company Limited
General.Description: Pacific Pipe Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes steel pipes for construction works in Thailand. It also provides steel fabrication services, such as cutting, drilling, and bending services. Pacific Pipe Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Phra Samut Chedi, Thailand.
General.Address: 298, 298/2, Soi Klabcharoen, Phra Samut Chedi, Thailand, 10290
